teaser: It might be number 48, but this weekend's football game is being called the first mass transit Super Bowl. The game will not be played in downtown Manhattan, but in East Rutherford, New Jersey. And with a Met Life stadium capacity of about 82,000 a lot of technology is being leveraged to actually get the fans to the game via public transportation.

title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, January 31, 2014
